text: Klossner is an unincorporated community in Lafayette Township, Nicollet County, Minnesota, United States, near New Ulm. The community is located near the junction of Nicollet County Road 5 and State Highway 15 (MN 15). Fritsche Creek flows nearby. Klossner was platted in 1897, and named for its founder, Jacob Klossner. A post office had been in operation at Klossner since 1896 but was closed on May 1, 1985. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Nicollet County, Minnesota Category:Unincorporated communities in Minnesota
title: Klossner, Minnesota
